abstract.t: This document describes the current status and work plans for the ENUM Forum and its Task Groups as an informational document to detail additional resources available and avoid overlap and duplication of efforts in the area of ENUM. The primary mission of the ENUM Forum is to develop the implementation framework for deploying RFC 2916 in a two-tiered DNS structure rooted under “e164.arpa” for E.164 numbers within the United States and a potential common implementation with other countries served by the North American Numbering Plan (NANP).
